text: Jim Pillen (born December 31, 1955) is an American Republican politician, veterinarian, and businessman who is the 41st and current Governor of Nebraska since 2023. He is a member of the Republican Party. Pillen was born in Columbus, Nebraska. He studied at the University of Nebraskaâ€“Lincoln and Kansas State University. From 1975 to 1978, he was a defensive back for the Nebraska Cornhuskers football team. Before entering politics, Pillen was a farmer and is a practicing veterinarian. He also works as chair of Pillen Family Farms. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Nebraska Category:Governors of Nebraska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:American football players Category:Sportspeople from Nebraska
title: Jim Pillen
